ygData.subject: Re: Hello and Question
ygData.msgSnippet: My only advise is to do as I do , stomp rats, snakes, and bats... oh my. SnowBard - Gentlemen Bard of Freeport... ... From: Daniel P. Sniderman
ygData.messageBody:
My only advise is to do as I do , stomp rats, snakes, and bats... oh my.

SnowBard - Gentlemen Bard of Freeport...
-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:slide@...]
Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 1:43 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Hello and Question


Hello all - I just discovered this board! I am a half-elf Bard on
Xegony. I have been operating in the Freeport areas mostly - and hope to
start some travelling in the near future...

I JUST made level 8 and have a few questions. Since I just made 8
and can develop String Instruments - should I sell my drum after getting the
lute? Is there any need for both? (Obviously a concern is carrying slots).
Is there a difference between the lute and the mandolin?

Lastly - I am always short of money. Most of my money goes to
songs - my armor is pretty thin. Any suggestions for making money.

I apologize if these questions have been answered many times
before - as I am new to the list. If there is a searchable archive
somewhere - please point me there!

Thanks

Slyde
AKA Dan Sniderman
